Просто лучшая игра. Отличная графика, оптимизация, самый лучший сюжет который я пока что видел, интересный и уникальный, разнообразный геймплей. И все это 9 лет назад. Думаю, другие комментарии не нужны.

В игре присутствует много головоломок, и мне это нравится!) Игра реально огонь, нужно думать и есть юмор. За свои деньги это игра заслуживает премию оскара!

I have now beaten Portal 2.

This is a perfect sequel in my opinion. Chel returns as the main character, as well as GLaDOS, and a new character, Wheatly! 

You start off back in the facility again, years after the events of Portal 1, but with your memories lost of the events of the first game. You meet Wheatly who agrees to help you get your freedom out into the world, and your adventure begins! I won't spoil more of the game, if you're like me and were just able to get the game.

The twists and turns in the game are fantastic, and end is brilliant! As well as the final song and new main menu screen like when you finished the first game. This game is brilliant, and if you enjoyed the first game, you'll love this one as well, if not more!
+rep

Просто по кайфу было проходить одно только музыкальное сопровождение чего стоит и для тех лет графика достойная даже на калькуляторе на минималках отлично идёт, головоломки тоже вроде сложные но когда проходишь и смотришь назад понимаешь что "пиздец ну я и тупой ,а что так можно было".Ах да за музыку в конце отдельный лайк.

Un gran juego en verdad, me parece que es un juego de portalcitos pero muy bien detallados misiones exelentes, y por no olvidar la protagonista es muy bella a primera vista, pero despues te vas dando cuenta que el amor a primera vista no existe. Por que? te preguntaras 

Porque tiene un ancho de tetas de 4,89 mml y la parte de detras (la cola) es bastante ancho y grande, pero ese no es el caso. En este juego experimentaras mucha excitacion y placer en tu miembro viril por esta bella mujer.

Saludos mi primo lucas

On the one hand you can play with a buddy in a classic puzzle adventure where your worst enemy is how long you can wait before killing your partner
On the other hand you play as a mute lady with brain damage trying to escape an underground facility from not one but two murderous a.i solving puzzles in the name of science
Fun

Amazing game that is still good today!

Grab your Portal gun, and remember the story of Chell, Portal 2 is at it again, but this time, Portal 2 has a steam workshop (Steam version only), it doesn't have as large of a workshop as POSTAL 2 (I mean Garry's Mod)...Portal 2 has a longer, and still not complicated story.

Pros
-Last Valve game on console
-Co-op
-Same 2 characters from the last game
-Kids won't have to ask their parent's permission to play

Cons
-Made Lemonade
-Gamer elitists hate it
-Can fry your computer if you are on a low end PC

While I don't exactly recommend, I also don't recommend it. If you are like me and have certain...we'll say issues, the constant demeaning nature of the game is really hard. BEFORE ANYONE SAYS IT! I already know it's part of the game. I justified everything by saying exactly that. It was just extremely hard for yet another 'person' to tell me I'm a waste of space. It was giving me severe depression, so I stopped playing despite how much I loved the first game. They just ramped up the demeaning nature of the 'voice'
The game is a very fun puzzle game and i loved it.

I know this game is about to be 10 years old but I do want to review it and simply say: this is one of my favorite games of all time. I will come back time and time again to the series and become OBSESSED with it. Play Portal 2 please I am begging you even if you aren't a gamer come on jus try it <3
